name: Crafted_Experienced_Marksman_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Increases range by {Boost.Attrib.Range.Scale}%. All of your snipe powers become instant-cast. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses. You get the set bonuses not marked "(PvP)" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
